overview:
Lyra McKee is a blogger and entrepreneur based in Belfast, Northern Ireland. Formerly CEO of news media startup NewsRupt, she runs marketing firm TechFluff (@TechFluffCo).

Lyra began life as a journalist, winning the Sky News Young Journalist of the Year award 2006 before going on to work with national broadcasters and newspapers, including the BBC. She dropped out of university to set up her first company. She then went on to work with a number of technology companies, including RepKnight (@RepKnight), before setting up TechFluff.

When not running TechFluff, Lyra blogs at www.techfluff.tumblr.com. She is currently working on a stealth startup project. Her Twitter profile is @LyraMcKee.
